statement.p: The half-life of caffeine in the human body is about 5.5 hours. A cup of coffee has about 115 mg of caffeine.

li.p: Write an equation for the amount of caffeine in a person's body after drinking a cup of coffee? Let C be the milligrams of caffeine in the body after t hours.
How much caffeine will remain after 10 hours?
State your answer to the nearest hundredth of a mg.
How long until there are only 20 mg remaining?
State your answer to the nearest hundredth of an hour.
